text: James Claude Wright, Jr. (December 22, 1922 - May 6, 2015) was an American politician from Texas.Jim Riddlesperger of Texas Christian University, "Jim Wright", West Texas Historical Association and East Texas Historical Association, joint meeting in Fort Worth, Texas, February 26, 2010 He served for 34 years in the U.S. House of Representatives and was the Speaker of the House from 1987 to 1989.
